organization.description: NHSSF is a life-changing organization that transcends the definition of a non-profit or community-based program; it helps people who wouldnGu00c7u00d6t have otherwise been able to purchase a home or get a mortgage; providing families with a foundation and sense of security in their lives. We have 6 lines of business: Homebuyer Preparation, Foreclosure Prevention, Lending, Real Estate Sales, Housing Development and Community Building.
organization.name: NEIGHBORHOOD HOUSING SERVICES OF SOUTH FLORIDA, INC.
